Class java.nio.file.Files

Added Methods
Stream<Path> find(Path, int, BiPredicate<Path, BasicFileAttributes>, FileVisitOption[]) Return a {@code Stream} that is lazily populated with {@code Path} by searching for files in a file tree rooted at a given starting file.
Stream<String> lines(Path) Read all lines from a file as a {@code Stream}.
Stream<String> lines(Path, Charset) Read all lines from a file as a {@code Stream}.
Stream<Path> list(Path) Return a lazily populated {@code Stream}, the elements of which are the entries in the directory.
BufferedReader newBufferedReader(Path) Opens a file for reading, returning a {@code BufferedReader} to read text from the file in an efficient manner.
BufferedWriter newBufferedWriter(Path, OpenOption[]) Opens or creates a file for writing, returning a {@code BufferedWriter} to write text to the file in an efficient manner.
List<String> readAllLines(Path) Read all lines from a file.
Stream<Path> walk(Path, int, FileVisitOption[]) Return a {@code Stream} that is lazily populated with {@code Path} by walking the file tree rooted at a given starting file.
Stream<Path> walk(Path, FileVisitOption[]) Return a {@code Stream} that is lazily populated with {@code Path} by walking the file tree rooted at a given starting file.
Path write(Path, Iterable<CharSequence>, OpenOption[]) Write lines of text to a file.
